name: Notify
description: The Notify module provides standardized notification functions for displaying messages to players.

clientFunctions.name: SendNotify
clientFunctions.description: Sends a notification to the player.
clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()
Bridge.Notify.SendNotify("Purchase successful!", "success")
Bridge.Notify.SendNotify("Insufficient funds!", "error")

clientFunctions.name: ShowHelpText
clientFunctions.description: Shows help text at the bottom of the screen.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The help text message to display

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()
Bridge.Notify.ShowHelpText("Press [E] to interact")

clientFunctions.name: HideHelpText
clientFunctions.description: Hides the currently displayed help text.

clientFunctions.name: GetResourceName
clientFunctions.description: Gets the name of the notification resource being used.

returns.description: The name of the notification resource

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()
local notifyResource = Bridge.Notify.GetResourceName()
print("Using notification resource: " .. notifyResource)
